column5: Our place is 2 miles from the Terlingua Ghostown with its magnificent views. Its easy to get to many restaurants & bars. Great shopping and outdoor recreation outfitters are nearby. We are near the national and state parks of the Big Bend. Close to fuel, grocery, bank & more. Our Casita offers an ambience that is over the top indoors and out. It offers quality and comfort. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We have a full house generator for power outages!
